title: Gen AI Foundational Models for NLP & Language Understanding
about: Understand foundational models for NLP and language understanding in generative AI, including embeddings and transformers.

topics.name: Embeddings
topics.details: Techniques for representing words and sentences as vectors.

topics.name: Transformers
topics.details: Introduction to transformer models for NLP tasks.

summary: This module introduces foundational models and techniques for NLP and language understanding in generative AI.
